price: 26. Markuu Alle yeelay kuwa gaaloobay quluubtooda ficilo - ficiladii waqtigii jaahiliyada - Wuxuuse Alle ku soo dejiyey xasilloonidiisa Rasuulkiisa iyo mu’miniinta, waafajiyeyna ku sugnaanta Ereyga dhowrsashada8, waxayna ahaayeen kuwo mudan oo ehelkeed ah. Alle wax walba waa Og yahay.
arabic: إِذۡ جَعَلَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فِي قُلُوبِهِمُ ٱلۡحَمِيَّةَ حَمِيَّةَ ٱلۡجَٰهِلِيَّةِ فَأَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ سَكِينَتَهُۥ عَلَىٰ رَسُولِهِۦ وَعَلَى ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَأَلۡزَمَهُمۡ كَلِمَةَ ٱلتَّقۡوَىٰ وَكَانُوٓاْ أَحَقَّ بِهَا وَأَهۡلَهَاۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمٗا
footnotes: 8. Kelmedda taqwada, waxaa loola jeedaa kelmedda Towxiidka, oo ah in Allaah loo gaar iyo gooni yeelo cibaadada.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: idh jaʿala alladhīna kafarū fī qulūbihimu al-ḥamiyata ḥamiyyata al-jāhiliyati fa-anzala al-lahu sakīnatahu ʿalā rasūlihi waʿalā al-mu'minīna wa-alzamahum kalimata al-taqwā wakānū aḥaqqa bihā wa-ahlahā wakāna al-lahu bikulli shayin ʿalīman
